Sharing is even better when you have photos in your meals.
Capture a meal by snapping photos of your food, the setting, and fellow diners.

Enjoy creating meals and Bon Appetit!

Choose notebooks to include in My Recipes section
Choose the notebook(s) where you store your recipes for them be included in My Cookbook. All notes in the specified notebook(s) will be added.
Choose tags to include in My Recipes section
Choose the tag(s) where you store your recipes for them be included in My Cookbook. All notes with specified tag(s) will be added.

Keep all of your treasured recipes in one place
Recipes clipped with Evernote Food or using the Evernote Web Clipper can be found here.
Capture your most delicious moments with Evernote Food
Include photos, captions, location, tags, and other notes to remember meals you have dining out or cooking at home.
Keep all of your favorite restaurants in one place

Whether cooking multiple recipes or deciding where to eat, come here to easily access your recently viewed content.

Recipes found in your Evernote account are automatically added to your Cookbook
Now you can add recipes from your Evernote account into My Cookbook by selecting notebooks or tags. Tap \"Add My Recipes\" to do this now, or find the option in Settings anytime.
Tap to clip recipes and save them to your Evernote account.
Whether planning a trip, or keeping track of new local spots, tap to clip restaurants you want to try.
